news.title: The Need for Speed in Search: 5 Speed Types to Master Now
news.description: To be competitive in search, you must audit and optimize desktop and mobile page speeds while also making data ready for real-time personalization.

news.title: Google Made 3,200 Changes to Search in the Past Year
news.description: Google made over 3,200 changes to its search system last year alone, reminding everyone that you should continually invest in improving your website.

news.title: Google Explains the Process for Rolling Out Changes to Search Results
news.description: In a blog post, Google recently explained that it implements changes to search results by making algorithmic changes that apply to a broad range of searches.

news.title: 5% of Google My Business Listing Views Result in a Customer Action
news.description: A new study from BrightLocal reveals some fascinating information about how customers are finding and interacting with Google My Business listings.
